adjacent-overload-signatures.good: // good foo 函数重载写在一起了 declare namespace NSFoo2 { export function foo(s: string): void; export function foo(n: number): void; export function foo(sn: string | number): void; export function bar(): void; } // good foo 函数重载写在一起了 type TypeFoo2 = { foo(s: string): void; foo(n: number): void; foo(sn: string | number): void; bar(): void; }; // good foo 函数重载写在一起了 interface IFoo2 { foo(s: string): void; foo(n: number): void; foo(sn: string | number): void; bar(): void; }
adjacent-overload-signatures.bad: // bad foo 函数重载没有写在一起 declare namespace NSFoo1 { export function foo(s: string): void; export function foo(n: number): void; export function bar(): void; export function foo(sn: string | number): void; } // bad foo 函数重载没有写在一起 type TypeFoo1 = { foo(s: string): void; foo(n: number): void; bar(): void; foo(sn: string | number): void; }; // bad foo 函数重载没有写在一起 interface IFoo1 { foo(s: string): void; foo(n: number): void; bar(): void; foo(sn: string | number): void; }

member-access.good: class Foo2 { private static foo = 'foo'; public static getFoo() { return Foo2.foo; } public constructor() {} protected bar = 'bar'; public getBar() {} public get baz() { return 'baz'; } public set baz(value) { console.log(value); } }
member-access.bad: // bad 没有指定 private protected 或 public class Foo1 { static foo = 'foo'; static getFoo() { return Foo1.foo; } constructor() {} bar = 'bar'; getBar() {} get baz() { return 'baz'; } set baz(value) { console.log(value); } }

member-ordering.good: // bad 类成员排序正确 class Foo1 { public static foo1 = 'foo1'; protected static foo2 = 'foo2'; private static foo3 = 'foo3'; public static getFoo1() {} protected static getFoo2() {} private static getFoo3() { return Foo1.foo3; } public bar1 = 'bar1'; protected bar2 = 'bar2'; private bar3 = 'bar3'; public constructor() { console.log(Foo1.getFoo3()); console.log(this.getBar3()); } public getBar1() {} protected getBar2() {} private getBar3() { return this.bar3; } }
member-ordering.bad: // bad 类成员没有正取的排序 class Foo2 { private getBar3() { return this.bar3; } protected getBar2() {} public getBar1() {} public constructor() { console.log(Foo1.getFoo3()); console.log(this.getBar3()); } private bar3 = 'bar3'; protected bar2 = 'bar2'; public bar1 = 'bar1'; private static getFoo3() { return Foo1.foo3; } protected static getFoo2() {} public static getFoo1() {} private static foo3 = 'foo3'; protected static foo2 = 'foo2'; public static foo1 = 'foo1'; }

no-empty-interface.good: // good 接口内容不为空 interface Foo1 { foo: string; }
no-empty-interface.bad: // bad 接口内容为空 interface Foo2 {}

no-import-side-effect.good: // good 可以导入了有副作用（立即执行）的 css, less, sass, scss 模块 import './test.css'; import './test.less'; import './test.sass'; import './test.scss'; // good 导入了模块之后再使用它 import * as tslint from 'tslint'; console.log(tslint.Linter);
no-import-side-effect.bad: // bad 导入了有副作用（立即执行）的 js 模块 import 'tslint';

no-inferrable-types.good: // good 可以推论出的类型不用手动指定类型 let foo2 = 1; let bar2 = ''; let baz2 = true;
no-inferrable-types.bad: // bad 给变量指定了没必要的类型声明 let foo1: number = 1; let bar1: string = ''; let baz1: boolean = true;

no-internal-module.good: // bad 使用 namespace 来定义命名空间 namespace Foo { }
no-internal-module.bad: // bad 使用 module 定义了命名空间 // @TODO 可以去掉 prettierignore 中的这个文件 https://github.com/prettier/tslint-config-prettier/issues/234 module Foo { }

no-magic-numbers.good: const NOT_FOUND = 404; console.error(NOT_FOUND, 'Error message'); console.log(Date.now() / 1000);
no-magic-numbers.bad: console.error(404, 'Error message');

no-namespace.good: import { foo } from './Foo'; foo(); declare namespace Bar { export function bar(): void; } Bar.bar();
no-namespace.bad: namespace Foo { export function foo() { console.log('foo'); } } Foo.foo();

no-non-null-assertion.good: interface Bar2 { baz: string; } function foo2(bar: Bar2 | null) { if (bar === null) { return ''; } return bar.baz; }
no-non-null-assertion.bad: interface Bar1 { baz: string; } function foo1(bar: Bar1 | null) { return bar!.baz; }

no-parameter-reassignment.good: function foo1(_bar: string) { const bar = _bar || ''; return bar; }
no-parameter-reassignment.bad: function foo2(bar: string) { bar = bar || ''; return bar; }

no-reference.good: /// <reference types="node" /> import './foo';

no-var-requires.good: import { foo } from './foo'; foo();
no-var-requires.bad: const { foo } = require('./foo'); foo();

only-arrow-functions.good: let foo2 = () => {}; function bar2() {} let baz2 = function baz2() {};
only-arrow-functions.bad: let foo1 = function() {};

prefer-for-of.good: let foo2 = [1, 2, 3]; for (let i of foo2) { console.log(foo2[i]); } for (let i = 0; i < foo1.length; i++) { console.log(foo1[i]); console.log(i); }
prefer-for-of.bad: let foo1 = [1, 2, 3]; for (let i = 0; i < foo1.length; i++) { console.log(foo1[i]); }

typedef-whitespace.good: let foo2: string;
typedef-whitespace.bad: let foo1:string; let bar1 :string; let baz1: string;

unified-signatures.good: function foo2(x: number | string): void; function foo2(x: any): any { return x; }
unified-signatures.bad: function foo1(x: number): void; function foo1(x: string): void; function foo1(x: any): any { return x; }

ban-comma-operator.good: let bar2 = 5; let baz2 = 6; let foo2 = baz2;
ban-comma-operator.bad: let foo1 = (bar1 = 5, baz1 = 6);
